title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Get ready to elevate your yoga and exercise experience with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat! This premium mat is designed with your comfort and convenience in mind. Made from NBR foam, this mat is extra thick and provides a soft cushion for your joints and muscles. Perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises, this mat is a must-have for any fitness enthusiast.

Measuring 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat is spacious enough for all your movements. The 2/5 inch thickness adds extra support and stability, making your workouts more enjoyable. The beautiful teal color adds a touch of style to your practice.

But that's not all - this mat comes with a convenient Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, making it easy to transport to and from your workouts. Say goodbye to bulky, awkward mats - the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is your new go-to for all your fitness needs. Upgrade your workout routine today!

Made from high-quality NBR foam, this mat is perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises.

But that's not all - this mat comes with an easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap, making it super convenient to take your mat with you wherever you go. The teal color adds a touch of style to your workout routine, while the durable construction ensures long-lasting use. Say goodbye to uncomfortable workouts and hello to the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat - your body will thank you!
